name: Super World Jump N Run
description:
Super World Jump N Run is classic platformer game inspired by the very old platformer games that lead you step back in time to your childhood with the legendary mission: Princess Rescue. Our hero can running and jumping to collect coins and can shoot (flame,laser,bomb and more..) to kill enemies its classic retro adventure platform with more than 80 levels,if you one of old platformer gamers and funs you might absolutely like this fun adventure game ,so can you help our hero save his princess ! if Yes let's do this Now and enjoy )

New tips :
Run Faster = double click on direction controller.
Long Jump = double click on direction controller + Jump Button.
